save.title: Save Graph
save.browserDescription: Save graphs in your browser. The graphs will be deleted when you clear the browser cache.
save.nostrDescription: Save graphs to your relays listed in kind:10002. Your pubkey is obtained from the NIP-07 extension.
save.fileDescription: Download the graph as a JSON file to your computer.
save.visibilityDescription: If you set visibility to Public, the graph will be shown when others open the load dialog and select Public. If you set it to For yourself, it will only be visible when others specify your pubkey as author in the load dialog. Note that For yourself does not encrypt the data.
save.relayUrlsPlaceholder:
wss://relay.example.com
(one per line, uses kind:10002 relays if empty)
save.errorNoNip07: NIP-07 extension not available. Please install a Nostr signer extension like nos2x or Alby.

load.title: Load Graph
load.browserDescription: Load graphs saved in your browser.
load.nostrDescription: Load graphs from Nostr relays. Select a filter to search for graphs.
load.fileDescription: Load a graph from a JSON file on your computer.
load.errorNoNip07: NIP-07 extension not available. Please install a Nostr signer extension like nos2x or Alby.
load.confirmDeleteFolder: Delete folder "{{name}}" and all graphs inside?
load.relayUrlsPlaceholder:
wss://relay.example.com
(one per line, uses kind:10002 relays if empty)
